rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.26+commit.8a97fa7a"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[],"name":"OnlyTimelock","type":"error"},{"inputs":[],"name":"ZeroTimelock","type":"error"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"oldTimelock","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"newTimelock","type":"address"}],"name":"TimelockUpdated","type":"event"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_timelock","type":"address"}],"name":"setTimelock","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"timelock","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"REPLACES the per-contract request/cancel/execute + pending-variable      pattern with a single `onlyTimelock` modifier.  The scheduling delay,      cancellation, overwrite-protection, and event emission are all handled      by the OZ TimelockController \u2014 no hand-rolled state needed. INTEGRATION PATTERN:   1. Inherit TimelockGoverned   2. Call `_setTimelock(addr)` in the constructor   3. Mark admin setters with `onlyTimelock`   4. Operations are scheduled on the MintedTimelockController,      which calls the setter after the delay expires.","kind":"dev","methods":{"setTimelock(address)":{"details":"Must be called *through* the current timelock (i.e. scheduled +      executed as a normal timelocked operation)."}},"title":"TimelockGoverned","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"setTimelock(address)":{"notice":"Migrate to a new timelock controller."},"timelock()":{"notice":"Address of the MintedTimelockController that gates admin ops"}},"notice":"Base contract for all protocol contracts that delegate admin         operations to a MintedTimelockController.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/TimelockGoverned.sol":"TimelockGoverned"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/=node_modules/@openzeppelin/",":eth-gas-reporter/=node_modules/eth-gas-reporter/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":hardhat/=node_modules/hardhat/"]},"sources":{"contracts/TimelockGoverned.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbdcbfa262f205afb02ac487e7e9f8d5cc366439126ec7efd7eb67b39010bda06","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://c29d9533adc391607755383245791db31284c03a399126c80e464694aaa3939c","dweb:/ipfs/QmSHsf7GTVLeFgnWUk3CFaDwqG8dnzRSGPHXoeyKn2YKTh"]}},"version":1}

setTimelock(address).details: Must be called *through* the current timelock (i.e. scheduled +      executed as a normal timelocked operation).

setTimelock(address).notice: Migrate to a new timelock controller.
